## linkify() function

Searches for URLs in a text and converts them to hyperlinks, either for HTML or markdown (default)

Based on [https://stackoverflow.com/a/25821576/1349766](https://stackoverflow.com/a/25821576/1349766)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function linkify(text: string, format?: "markdown" | "html"): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string |  |
|  format | "markdown" \| "html" |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
